title: Enslaved Haitians Plan Uprising - connect to US

content.question: Which of the following best describes a connection between the Haitian Revolution and the United States?

choices.label: For American abolitionists, revolution created widespread anxiety and deep fear about the growth of slavery.
For white Americans in the South, the defeat of a large-scale slave rebellion created a sense of security.
For some African Americans, Haiti’s independence highlighted the unfulfilled promises of the American Revolution.
For many plantation owners in the South, the fear of a similar conflict increased their support for the abolitionist movement.

content.answer: For some African Americans, Haiti’s independence highlighted the unfulfilled promises of the American Revolution.

skill.text: 1.C: Identify and explain patterns, connections, or other relationships (causation, changes, continuities, comparison).
